title: Mobile Language Learning Design Utilizing Game Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive learning using gamified mobile apps in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply 50 basic expressions of the target language contextually using game metaphors (e.g., quests, level-ups) in mobile environments
Learners improve learning efficiency by correcting over 80% of language use errors in real-time through game-based feedback

Learners complete 3+ role-playing game (RPG) scenarios with peers via mobile collaboration tools (Slack, Discord, etc.) and achieve a 'B' (80–89%) grade or higher in 4 of 5 rubric categories (communication clarity, collaboration efficiency, language accuracy).

resources: Zoom Account and Mobile App Development Platform

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
